channel.title: COVID-19 on Charlie Song
channel.description: Recent content in COVID-19 on Charlie Song

item.title: COVID-19 Visualisation and Analysis
item.description: I have made some visualisation on COVID-19 data using Plotly, this includes views by Countries, by Continents, daily increases, daily new cases etc. The second part of this project has more in depth exploration on the situation in the U.S. by different states. Some of the plots are below: Link to Kaggle
